description: Add ice. Add 1.5oz Seagram's 7 and top with 7-Up to the glass

name: Acapulco
flavoring agents: Triple Sec, Egg White, Lime Juice, Simple Syrup
description: Fill a shaker with ice. Add 1.5oz white rum, 0.5oz triple sec, 1 egg white, 0.5oz lime juice, and 0.5oz simple syrup to the shaker. Shake and Strain the drink into a glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Alabama Slammer
baseSpirit: Southern Comfort, Amaretto, Vodka, Sloe Gin
description: Fill a shaker with ice. Add 0.5oz Southern Comfort, 0.5oz amaretto, 0.5oz vodka, 0.5oz sloe gin, and 4oz orange juice to the shaker. Shake and Strain the drink into a glass filled with ice.

name: Amaretto Sour
flavoring agents: Lemon Juice, Simple Syrup, Egg White, Angostura bitter
description: Fill a glass with ice. Add the 1.5oz amaretto, 1.5oz lemon juice, 0.5oz simple syrup, 0.5 egg white and 4 dashes of bitters to a shaker. Dry shake and pour the drink into the glass and garnish with an orange.
